MenuBar - Class in net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components
Class used to create an organized bar used as a menu for any specific purpose or another.

Create a MenuBar inside of the specified parent Panel.
MenuItem - Class in net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components
Class used to organize items within a MenuBar.
MenuItem(String, MenuBar) - Constructor for class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.MenuItem
Create a MenuItem with the specified name.
minus(Point3f) - Method in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util.Point3f
Subtract the values from the given Point with this Point.
For example:
Point3f p1 = new Point3f(3, 6, 1);
Point3f p2 = new Point3f(1, 6, 4);
Point3f p3 = p1.minus(p2);
p3 contains the values (2, 0, -3).
minus(float, float, float) - Method in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util.Point3f
Subtract the values from the given values with this Point.
For example:
Point3f p1 = new Point3f(3, 6, 1);
Point3f p2 = p1.minus(1, 6, 4);
p2 contains the values (2, 0, -3).
MissingCharacterException - Exception in net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.font
Exception thrown when a Character is missing from the character array given to the Font.
MissingCharacterException(String) - Constructor for exception net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.font.MissingCharacterException
Create the Exception with a message to describe the error.

MOUSE_WHEEL_BUTTON - Static variable in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.ButtonEvent
 
MOUSE_WHEEL_BUTTON - Static variable in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.input.Mouse
 
mouseDown(MouseEvent) - Method in interface net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseListener
Method called when a Mouse button is down.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in interface net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseListener
Method called when the Mouse has entered the Frame.
MouseEvent - Class in net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events
Class created and passed along with any MouseListener Event calls.
MouseEvent(int, int, int) - Constructor for class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseEvent
Create a MouseEvent at the specified location with the specified button index.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in interface net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseListener
Method called when the Mouse has exited the Frame.
MouseListener - Interface in net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events
Class that is used to listen for MouseEvents that occur whenever an event has occurred with the Mouse.
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in interface net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseListener
Method called when the Mouse has been moved.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in interface net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseListener
Method called when a Mouse button has been pressed.
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in interface net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseListener
Method called when a Mouse button has been previously been pressed and is now released.
mouseUp(MouseEvent) - Method in interface net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events.MouseListener
Method called when a Mouse button has been released.
move(float, float, float) - Method in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util.Camera
Move the Camera the specified amount in the direction of (dx, dy, dz) in the scene.
move(int, float) - Method in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util.Camera
Move the Camera in the specified direction the specified amount of units.
Options for the direction includes:
FORWARD BACKWARD LEFT RIGHT UP DOWN
move(float, float, float) - Method in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util.Point3f
Move the Point3f instance as if it is a Point in space.
For example:
Point3f p = new Point3f(5, 7, -3);
p.move(-4, 3, 12);
p now contains the values (1, 10, 9).
moveDirection(float, float, float) - Method in class net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util.Camera
Move the Camera along the specified direction (dx, dy, dz).
